name: MarkWeirath.GitHub.io
body:
> I code for fun, it's not my "core business". I'm employed at the **University of Twente** where I work at Culture and Events and as a tutor/mentor for the Bachelor Program of Creative Technology

## GitHub organisations:

* [BigBrotherBot](https://github.com/BigBrotherBot) (Python)
* [XLRstats](https://github.com/XLRstats) (PHP)

## Plugins for BigBrotherBot:

A small selection of my public plugins for BigBrotherBot is listed below, some of my private repositories can be found on [GitLab](https://gitlab.com/u/xlr8or)
 
#### Major

* [XLRstats](http://www.xlrstats.com) (Real time player statistics tracking - plugin is part of the B3 distribution package)
* [PowerAdmin Series](https://github.com/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=poweradmin+language%3APython&type=Repositories&ref=advsearch&l=Python) (Initiator of the Game Specific PowerAdmin plugins)

#### Minor

* [IP Ban](http://markweirath.github.io/b3-plugin-ipban/) (Enforce B3 bans on IP address)
* [Net Blocker](http://markweirath.github.io/b3-plugin-netblocker/) (Block IP addresses and ranges)
* [Country Filter](http://markweirath.github.io/b3-plugin-countryfilter) (allow/disallow countries based on GEOIP information)
* [Rotation Manager](https://github.com/markweirath/b3-plugin-rotationmanager) (Manages maprotations based on playercount on CoD servers)
* [Private Server](http://markweirath.github.io/b3-plugin-privateserver) (Restrict access to you server based on level, guid or IP address)
* [Action Logger](http://markweirath.github.io/b3-plugin-actionlogger) (Log all admin commands to a logfile)

## Repositories

[all my github repositories](https://github.com/markweirath?tab=repositories)
